description: Concerns are raised after Flybe's collapse has a knock-on effect on flight prices to the UK.
title: Isle of Man passengers 'held to ransom' by lack of flights
title_page: Isle of Man passengers 'held to ransom' by lack of flights - BBC News
maintext: Mr Callister said: "If there's less seats it increases the costs, that's how their model works. We need the competition there in order to drive some of the pricing down.
